name: The Eldrich Book
description:
Once upon a time there was a young swordsgirl named Valerie. She enjoyed nothing more than not having to slay dire rats in the castle basement. That's why she jumped at the chance to go investigate a monster attack on a village in the mountains. Sounds spooky enough already doesn't it? However the true quest would soon reveal itself in a most "please go do this" way.  Come and see for yourself what problems The Eldritch Book has caused. 

*3Dish monsters!
* Possibly/Going for Lovecraftian themes!
*Newy magic system to try!
